bike.description: Pat Laughlin Signature Model, 100% Cr-Mo, Double Butted Main Frame, Integrated Head Tube, Integrated Seat Clamp, Mid BB, Drilled for Removable Rotor Tabs, Cable Guides & Brake Mounts

components.description: 3-pc Cr-Mo 175mm, Mid Sealed Bearing, 25T Bubble Sprocket
SE Alloy 36H 3/8" F & 14mm R Hubs with Double Wall Rims, 9T Driver
Tektro FX340R U-Brake, Soft Compound Shoes
SE Front Load Alloy, Lightweight External Cutouts
Big Daddy Jackhammer Grip w/ Rubber SE End Plugs
Lightweight SE Seat/Post Combo w/ Thin Padding
